message:
Hi Stephen,

Re: "...the common methods like LogInformation first call IsEnabled and then Log..."

Personally I would like it if they did call IsEnabled but unfortunately they just call straight onto Log:

[https://github.com/aspnet/Logging/blob/dev/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions/LoggerExtensions.cs](https://github.com/aspnet/Logging/blob/dev/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions/LoggerExtensions.cs)

Mike.
